ygData.subject: Re: fetch only pdf data
ygData.msgSnippet: Add two filters in the decide rules - 1. org.archive.crawler.deciderules.RejectDecideRule 2. org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesFilePatternDecideRule Go to

Add two filters in the decide rules -
1. org.archive.crawler.deciderules.Re=
jectDecideRule 
2. org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesFilePatternDecide=
Rule

Go to "settings" and set the second rule to accept .pdf files.

Joey
=
